alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 03 at 4:26AM MDT until May 03 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Owyhee county and southwest Twin Falls County above 5000 feet. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This advisory is for higher elevations between Highway 51 and Highway 93 near the Idaho-Nevada border.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
